lead_paragraph: The student’s lawsuit, filed Wednesday, says that an officer used unreasonable force while breaking up a fight in December.

headline.print_headline: Student Sues Police Dept., Citing Blows  From a Baton
headline.main: Student Sues Police Over Baton Encounter in Brooklyn High School

snippet: The student’s lawsuit, filed Wednesday, says that an officer used unreasonable force while breaking up a fight in December.
abstract: Brooklyn high school student Yordy Aragonez files lawsuit against New York Police Dept that claims unreasonable force was used to breakup fight at Progress High School; video recorded on cellphone shows he was struck by Police Officer Kareem Phillips with baton at least twice .
